channel.title: Dropbug? PI

item.title: Dropbug? PI
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

ok i got this new problem on my server.

when u die in wildy and u wear full bandos and 1 firecape or 1 f torso or 1 f hat or 1 chaotics weapon you lose like normally ur bandos in a drop.

if u wear 3 or 4 of that items mixed or same (like 3 f torso’s or 1 f torso f cape and t hat) and u wear d boots bandos tassy etc the enemy don’t get the items in the drop while the player that dies is skulled

if you don’t get it watch the VID.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4X5l14XlYn0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

can somebody help me.

this is what i coded btw.

public void createGroundItem(Client c, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerId) { if(itemId > 0) { if (itemId == 6570) { return; } if (itemId == 15313) { return; } if (itemId == 15040) { return; } if (itemId == 15038) { return; } if (itemId == 15037) { return; } if (itemId == 10551) { return; } if (itemId == 10548) { return; } if (itemId >= 2412 && itemId <= 2414) { c.sendMessage("The item vanishes as it touches the ground."); return; }

Read full topic
